attributes.action: End Common Purpose in The United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, demand with the upmost urgency that the Prime Minister act to end Common Purpose and its operations.

Common Purpose is a corrupt, subversive, secretive and deeply sinister organisation with a hidden agenda (Communitarian Neo-Communism, social control, corporate and EU state control) and hidden backers (Tavistock Institute, Fabian Society, Brussels).

We totally reject Common Purpose - IT MUST GO!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
